LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HEAT.label: 83mm SMAW rocket (HEAT)
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HEAT.description: 83mm rocket designed for the Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon (SMAW). After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the warhead further.
